SELECT orders.id, orders.customer_id customerId, customer.name customerName, orders.card_id cardId, card.card_name cardName, card.card_number cardNumber, card.bill_date billDate, card.replay_date replayDate, orders.type, orders.total, orders.rate, orders.fee, orders.discount, IFNULL(sumimport.sumBill,0) sumBill, orders.real_fee realFee, orders.status, orders.remark, orders.seg, orders.create_time createTime, orders.update_time updateTime, orders.opt_id optId FROM wk.wk_order orders LEFT JOIN wk.wk_customer customer ON customer.id = orders.customer_id LEFT JOIN wk.wk_card card ON card.id = orders.card_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT order_id id,sum(bill) sumBill FROM wk.wk_order_import WHERE result = 1 GROUP BY order_id ) sumimport ON sumimport.id = orders.id
AND orders.customer_id = #{customerId} AND orders.card_id = #{cardId} AND orders.type = #{type} ORDER BY orders.seg DESC, orders.update_time DESC limit #{pageStart},#{pageSize}
